title: Kiss It Better
description:
He’s got healing hands and soothing words.

Too bad the gorgeous doctor is my dad’s best friend.

The first time Dr Stewart fixes up my scrapes, it’s an accident, I swear. A patch of ice, my bunny slippers and a fire alarm all conspire to land me in his capable hands.But the second time… and the third…Okay, I admit it. No one’s really this accident prone.But I can’t help it. He may be older and way off limits, but I want his hands on me. His eyes on mine.And if I ever get my wish… the doctor’s white coat in a pile on the floor.
Kiss It Better is a short and steamy instalove story, starring a love struck patient and her crush-in-scrubs.
author: Cassie Mint
